manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Features Vinyl Top: Low maintenance and easy to clean Lightweight: Easy to move and store Folds Flat: Folds up tight and compact for easy storage Non-Marring Leg Tips: Protects floor surfaces Steel Powder Coated Frame: Strong and durable for many uses COSCO Products 20" x 48" Vinyl Top Folding Table, Black, 1-pack COSCO Products 20" x 48" vinyl top table is a great table for computer use, arts and crafts, training rooms and buffet lines. Unfold some fun with a versatile table designed for indoor or light outdoor use. This table is stylish, strong and easy to clean, making it the table for any occasion. This table saves space and time with legs that fold in to make for easy storage. A steel powder coated frame finishes this table providing strength and durability. Product Measurements Height: 28" Width: 20" Depth: 48" Weight: 12.5 lbs

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value at little cost
reviews.reviewText: The table is true to the picture and measurements. I like that smart looking black top, ease of opening/closing, and how light weight it is. It is sturdy, not lopsided, and seems to be able to hold some weight. I just use it for display purposes of articles in our library, but more could go on it. The price is more than fair and it DOES NOT FOLD IN THE MIDDLE, something I did not want. Its a bargain!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect For Crafter!
reviews.reviewText: Each year I make almost 100 small Christmas gifts for people with whom I do business during any given year (ie. bank, vet, post office, etc.). I love making them and being able to show people in the little town in which I live how much I appreciate them. The problem has always been coming up with a reasonable surface on which to place them as each gift dries between processes, as well as be able to store the finished products until I am ready to distribute them. This table solves both problems.First, it is lightweight, yet very sturdy, can easily hold whatever gifts I decide to make through all of the various processes; it is easy to set up and break-down to move; the size makes it easy to work around and walk around.I ordered one of these tables and when it arrived, I quickly ordered the second. Right now, I have them set up next to my painting table and they are perfect! I am just in the middle of making these year's gifts and it has been so easy to shuttle them between painting table and these tables, while still giving me plenty of room to walk around. When the project is finished, the tables and gifts will be moved to the storage side of my basement to wait for Christmas delivery. There, these tables mean the 100 gifts won't be in the way or on some big, clunky surface I keep running into until I start giving them. After that, the tables will easily fold and be stored out of the way until next year's gift production.These tables make my annual gift-making so much easier, especially the stages between between beginning and completion. Yes, it's the little things...and having the perfect platform to accommodate these little things through each process.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good multipurpose side table
reviews.reviewText: It's very long and thin yet very broad and spacious! Stands nicely on the side against the wall, can put kitchen things on it when the kitchen counter is too small, e.g. water jug, fruit basket, etc. Very light and can pick it up and move it around easily, which makes it not the most steady, but is still very satisfactory. Would avidly recommend for its incredible multipurpose functionality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for when you need to seat a few more
reviews.reviewText: If anything, I wish it was a little wider, but it still managed 4 extra people with a little judicious seating and a buffet dinner. Very reasonable, should last a while. Took us a moment to get it refolded, but now it has given up its secrets and is ensconced in its place of honor, under the spare bed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The best, portable, affordable, lightweight, cute , functional-party tables A+

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was really impressed for what you get for $30. I required a fairly small lightweight and portable table for a small gaming setup. It's perfect because I just moved without furniture and will use it for a few months until I order a nice desk. With two 27" monitors, an Xbox Series S and Nintendo Switch, it is fairly sturdy and does not move a whole lot. I can see how the vinyl would rip, but I think it's a fair trade off. It doesn't have the appearance of a bad plastic cheap table. I will say that if I had a single monitor, 27" would be okay depending on how long the back part of the stand is. Unfortunately on one of mine, the thing is 10" so the monitor is halfway in front of me so I had to position them to the corners. I'm planning on getting a better VESA stand anyways. Otherwise I'd say 27" monitors are pushing it maxumum for this table but would be PERFECT for just putting down a laptop and/or docking it to a 24" monitor. Needless to say, I do enjoy the minimalist aesthetic it gives.I can see this also coming in handy for other things once I'm done using it for my computer/gaming stuff. It's very easy to store and I was able to toss it in the backseat of my car.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy set up and perfect size
reviews.reviewText: Just un-boxed this today, and is the perfect size and fits in my small home studio space very nicely. Seems reasonably sturdy and didn't get any finger pinches during the set up. Great price; highly recommend this superior product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The table is light, easy to fold but the material is quite cheap and not very good. Left outside on the garden and if it rains and gets wet? it will mess up the entire table as the material used to make them is cheap. Good table for arts and crafts for indoor use but not for outdoor use or to place heavy things. Any water on it will ruin the table quick!
Very good value if you’re looking for a portable temporary desk with space saving storage

reviews.reviewTitle: Just unfold the legs of the table
reviews.reviewText: Easily unfolded, no assembly required. Quite sturdy. A little bit heavy but not too heavy. Can be used anywhere, in the kitchen, in the living room.

reviews.reviewTitle: Perfect for my narrow sunroom. Lovely top and looks beautiful. I use it for painting in my sunroom.
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for hosting you can have it against a wall and fits a lot food. Easy to reach across
This isn't a load bearing table. Perfect for hobbies, arts and crafts. And the price can't be beat.

reviews.reviewTitle: Can be used for number of activities
reviews.reviewText: I am using the table as a clothes sorting table for my teen granddaughter(assembly line for her work clothes)It can also be used as extra room at dinner for extra guests.I am also planning on using it for my yard sale this summer.I can also use it to sort my paperwork out. I really like it.Good size, lightweight.
